title: Trump to impose sanctions on Turkey over actions in Syria
text:
President Donald Trump announced Monday that he will issue an executive order imposing “powerful” sanctions against Turkey for its incursion into northeast Syria.

“The United States will aggressively use economic sanctions to target those who enable, facilitate, and finance these heinous acts in Syria,” Trump said in a statement. "I am fully prepared to swiftly destroy Turkey’s economy if Turkish leaders continue down this dangerous and destructive path.”

Story Continued Below

Trump has come under fire for his decision to pull back U.S. troops from northeast Syria, leaving top Pentagon officials and national security leaders caught off guard.
